sentences.en: But such single - nucleotide polymorphism ( SNP ) profiles can be deceptive, Duster warns.
sentences.cn: 但达斯特提出警告,这种[单核苷酸多型性]的剖析可能会有错误.
达斯特发觉这些谈话令人忧心.

sentences.en: He gave his counter a polish with a soft duster.
sentences.cn: 他用软抹布擦亮了自己的柜台。

sentences.en: He went over the surfaces with a duster.
sentences.cn: 他用抹布擦干净了表面.

sentences.en: It was the kind of duster not experienced in years.
sentences.cn: 这种沙尘天气好多年都没遇到过了.

sentences.en: She held her feather duster by handle.
The driver went ouver his car quickly with a duster.
sentences.cn: 司机很快用鸡毛掸把车打扫了一遍.

sentences.en: The girl went over the room quickly with a duster.
sentences.cn: 这个姑娘用掸帚很快地清扫了这个房间.

sentences.en: The maid did down the walls with a duster.
sentences.cn: 女佣用掸帚由上而下地刷除四壁上的尘垢.

sentences.en: The maid went over the room quickly with a duster.
sentences.cn: 那个女仆用掸子很快地给房间掸尘.

sentences.en: The stove and chopping board were brand - new, and in one corner stood a multicolored feather duster.
sentences.cn: 火炉与菜案却是新的; 屋角里插着把五色鸡毛的掸子.

sentences.en: Tom: A feather duster, with which father wakes me up every morning.
sentences.cn: 汤姆: 鸡毛掸子,爸爸每天都用它叫我起床.

sentences.en: Tom: feather duster, with which father wakes me up every morning.
sentences.cn: 汤姆: 鸡毛掸子,爸爸天天都用它叫偶起床.

sentences.en: You can't go to a party dressed as a feather duster!
sentences.cn: 你怎么能穿的象个鸡毛掸子样的去派对!

words.tran_cn: 抹布，掸子；[环境]除尘器；打扫灰尘的人

trans.tran_cn: 抹布，尘拂，撢子，<美>防尘罩衫
trans.tran_en: a cloth for removing dust from furniture
